attributes.action: give school pupils the right to have a say in what happens in their school, to be able to intervene in rule making and have a strong voice in the school community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment in Britain's schools pupils are made to follow unfair rules made by senior staff and governors who do not understand and appreciate the needs of the pupils. The government should introduce legislation that ensures pupils the definite right to a say in what goes on in their schools and stops staff from making unnecessary, unfair rules which cause great anger and unhappiness within the school community.
